alert.note: Alert for Dunn; Pierce; St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:21PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Washington, northern Pierce, northwestern Dunn and St. Croix Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 521 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Hammond, or 17 miles northeast of River Falls, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Baldwin around 530 PM CDT. Woodville around 540 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Glenwood City, Boyceville and Knapp. This includes Interstate 94 in Wisconsin between mile markers 1 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for east central Minnesota...and northwestern and west central Wisconsin.
